OPrime: Open Experimentation was created by the iLanguage Lab ltd, an OpenSource Fieldlinguistics company in Montreal, Canada.
On the OPrime site you can access all our issues and milestones which serve as instructions and documentation of how to use this code base.

Special thanks to the Montreal Computational Linguistics community, Android Montreal, Javascript Montreal and the Android Open Source developers for their work which directly or indirectly contributed to this project.
